text: <@U6A936746> the important point is that people within the org have been able to setup a proxy to <http://pkg.julialang.org|pkg.julialang.org> - <http://github.com|github.com> is not allowed. Similarly, we have a conda repository proxy. It should be about security but is more a matter of "well, if the official language's repository is hosting the package, then it is safe to install and use".
